mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKMEMBER (id, pass, name,email,team,cell) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name},#{email},#{team},#{cell})
mapper.select: SELECT A.id,A.name,A.email,A.address,A.cell,A.home, B.borrowdate, B.returndate FROM BOOKMEMBER as A ,BOOKRENT as B WHERE NOW() > B.returndate AND B.borrowcheck ='2' and A.id=B.id;
SELECT A.name, A.score, A.id, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKRENT B WHERE B.borrowdate > date_sub(NOW(), interval 30 day) AND B.id=A.id ) AS numborrow FROM BOOKMEMBER AS A ORDER BY numborrow DESC
SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKRENT B WHERE B.borrowdate > date_sub(NOW(), interval 30 day) AND B.id=A.id ) AS numborrow FROM BOOKMEMBER A ORDER BY team
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation(id, bookCode, reserveDate, reservecheck) VALUES(#{id}, #{bookCode}, date_add(now(), interval 7 day), 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOKMST SET borrowcheck='1', reservecheck='0' WHERE bookCode=#{bookCode}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOOKMST AS A, reservation AS B WHERE A.bookCode=B.bookCode AND B.reservecheck='1' ORDER BY B.reservedate DESC;
mapper.delete: DELETE ON reserve WHERE id=#{id} AND bookCode=#{bookCode}
